name: Hide 'N Seek!
summary: Prepare to experience a high-stakes twist on the classic game of hide and seek with Extreme Hide and Seek. Dive into the action as you choose to either hide from or seek out your opponents. If you opt to hide, blend seamlessly into the environment, stay silent, and outsmart the Seeker to secure victory. Or, take on the role of the Seeker, counting down before setting off to find and capture all the elusive Hiders. With heart-pounding gameplay that puts a thrilling spin on the beloved childhood pastime, Extreme Hide and Seek challenges players to master the art of concealment or the thrill of the hunt.
